amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to carry out an advanced technology northern border security pilot program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3837 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3837 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S10541-10543) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to carry out an advanced technology northern border security pilot program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3837 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3837 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Conrad.
